creator: miamidot@gmail.com
text:
In the web page,
http://logging.apache.org/log4net/
The Logging Services logo which I presumed is constructed using a floating 
frame is obscuring the first paragraph.

This annoyance affects most of other log4j pages.

What's the point of having text on a web page which I cannot read?

creator: carnold@apache.org
text: Thanks, but that is a log4net issue that should be reported at http://issues.apache.org/jira.
